text: Simone Vagnozzi (; born 30 May 1983) is an Italian professional tennis player. ==ATP Tour finals== ===Singles (1 title, 2 runner-ups)=== {|class=wikitable style=font-size:97% !Legend |-bgcolor=e5d1cb |ATP Challenger Series |} {|class=wikitable style=font-size:97% !No. !width=125|Date !width=160|Tournament !Surface !width=180|Opponent !width=180|Score |-bgcolor=e5d1cb |1. |11 June 2007 |Bytom, Poland |Clay | Peter Luczak |3–6, 3–6 |-bgcolor=e5d1cb |2. |26 May 2008 |Alessandria, Italy |Clay | Paolo Lorenzi |6–4, 6–7(5–7), 6–7(4–7) |-bgcolor=e5d1cb |1. |27 June 2010 |Marburg, Germany |Clay | Ivo Minář |2–6, 6–3, 7–5 |} ==References== Category:Italian male tennis players Category:Living people Category:1983 births
title: Simone Vagnozzi
